name: Example LMS
tagline: A learning management system for delivering and tracking online coursework.
content: Example LMS provides course hosting, grade tracking, and assignment management for staff and students.

name: QuickAssess
tagline: An assessment platform for screening and progress monitoring in reading and math.

name: MathWorld Online
tagline: An interactive math practice and instruction tool for K-8 students.
content: MathWorld Online offers adaptive practice, video lessons, and real-time progress dashboards.

name: ReadAlong
tagline: A phonics-based reading tool designed for early elementary students.

name: ClassChat
tagline: A classroom behavior and communication app connecting teachers, students, and parents.

name: DataDash
tagline: A student data and analytics dashboard for administrators.
content: DataDash aggregates data from multiple sources to provide at-a-glance analytics on enrollment, attendance, and achievement.

name: CreativeCanvas
tagline: A digital art and design tool for student creative projects.

name: SecureTest Pro
tagline: A secure browser and platform for administering standardized tests.

name: TechTicket
tagline: An IT helpdesk and asset management platform for school technology departments.
content: TechTicket provides ticket tracking, device inventory, and self-service portals for staff.

name: VideoLearn
tagline: A video-based instructional library covering core academic subjects.
